name: Crazy Air Travel
description:
Crazy air travel - tap the screen and control the height of the air balloon flight. Collect coins on the way and avoid crashes. Start an air journey across the world of this Android game. Enjoy your flight on a beautiful balloon. But be attentive and change the flight height to prevent the balloon from crashing against planes, helicopters, airships, birds and other flying objects. Try to gather maximum coins to buy new balloons and upgrade them. Unlock new locations.

Features:
- 90 immersive missions to complete
- Many skins of Air Balloons
- Beautiful places
- Simple control
- Free-to-play game (f2p)
- Upgrade your power, fuel, shields, coin magnet, double coins
- Get new upgrades to fly even further
- Challenge your friends to beat your high score
- Share your score with a screenshot with your friends
- Synchronize game progress between devices
-New Runner
-Progress save

Get many exciting emotions with the game "Air Travel"!
